title: MEWA Corporate Culture Gamification Platform

content.value: A comprehensive gamification platform developed for the *Ministry of Environment, Water & Agriculture (MEWA)* to engage employees with corporate culture values through interactive games and quizzes.

The platform features three main activities: a *Flower Game* where users grow plants by answering care-related questions, a *Personality Quiz* to discover their workplace persona, and a *Commitment Quiz* to test their alignment with ministry values.

content.caption: The Flower Game selection screen where users choose a native plant to grow.

content.value: In the *Flower Game*, users select a native plant and grow it by answering questions related to the ministry's culture. This interactive approach helps employees learn about environmental values in a fun and engaging way.

content.caption: Personality Quiz result showing the 'Falah' (Farmer) persona with character traits.

content.value: The *Personality Quiz* engages employees by identifying their professional persona based on their choices. Each result, such as the 'Falah', comes with a unique set of traits that reflect their contribution to the organization.
Built with *Next.js* and *Socket.IO*, the platform includes a *Live Display* that visualizes real-time participation, creating a collective digital garden representing the employees' engagement.

shortDescription: Corporate culture gamification platform for MEWA featuring interactive games, quizzes, and real-time event visualization.
metaDescription: MEWA Gamification Platform: An interactive Next.js application for employee engagement using games, quizzes, and real-time socket.io displays.
objectives: Engage employees with *MEWA's corporate culture values*.
Educate staff on environmental and agricultural concepts through *gamified learning*.
Foster a sense of community through *real-time collective visualization*.
Provide a seamless, *mobile-friendly experience* for event attendees.

functionality.description: A nurturing game where users grow a digital plant by answering culture-related questions.
An interactive quiz that determines the user's professional personality type based on their choices.
A scored assessment of the user's alignment with corporate values.
A real-time dashboard showing collective progress and participation stats using Socket.IO.
QR code-based registration system with phone number verification.

challenges.challenge: Implementing real-time synchronization for the live display using Socket.IO.
challenges.solution: Optimized *Socket.IO* event handling to ensure low-latency updates for the live dashboard.

challenges.challenge: Ensuring a smooth and responsive UI with complex animations and Arabic RTL layout.
challenges.solution: Utilized *Tailwind CSS* for responsive design and carefully managed React state to ensure smooth animations in RTL layout.

challenges.challenge: Managing state across multiple games and persistent user progress.
challenges.solution: Used a centralized state management approach and *SQLite* to track and persist user progress across different games.

results: Successfully *engaged employees* in the corporate culture launch event.
Provided *real-time visualization* of participation, enhancing the event atmosphere.
Collected *valuable data* on employee engagement and values alignment.
notes: This project demonstrates the integration of gamification strategies with modern web technologies to achieve corporate communication goals.
